Title: Software applications
Description: End-users should be able to use appropriate and familiar software applications for data analysis. For this, they should have access to a central repository for software packages within the federation from any TRE. Software quality and safety should be monitored by an approval process for new packages added to the repository/ packages requested by users.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Creation of a unified repository for Software Packages
User manual on using software applications and how to use the repository of software packages
Document for evaluation criteria of software packages in the repository and audit logs
Federation software governance policy mentioning approval processes
Central software repository with audit logs of package approvals
